messages.subject: What Happened?
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to post this - for some reason Yahoo Groups had me turned off from receiving e-mails for a few days. They sent me an e-mail which I replied to
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to post this - for some reason Yahoo Groups had me
turned off from receiving e-mails for a few days. They sent me an
e-mail which I replied to and it is supposed to be fixed. So, I did
not receive by e-mail any of the postings from May 7 thru May 9. I
will go thru those postings now and respond if it is appropriate and
I apologize if anyone was waiting for a response.

Scott
